ideas.title: cat_fact_encyclopedia
ideas.description: This application provides users with a deep dive into the feline world by presenting a random cat fact alongside relevant breed information, fostering both entertainment and knowledge. Users can learn about unique facts while also exploring the breed characteristics associated with these facts.
apis_used: cat facts (Retrieve a random cat fact) & cat facts (Retrieve a list of cat breeds) - The random cat fact provides the user with an interesting tidbit
while the list of cat breeds allows users to research what breeds might be associated with the fact. The combination creates an interactive learning experience about cats.
